DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy tolerability Clopirin clopidogrel aspirin Korean Patients post-percutaneous coronary artery intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Assess Efficacy Combination Formula Aspirin Plus Clopidogrel Patients With Coronary Stent
DOC.criteria: Over 3 month , patient administration aspirin coadministration clopidogrelaspirin coronary artery patient treat Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) safety progress . Korean men woman age 20 85 Patients understand study requirement , willing comply study procedure provide write informed consent . Patients treat PCI intend treat PCI fail . Patients take take antiplatelet anticoagulant 2 week within prior 30 day . Patients history alcohol abuse intoxication . Patients hypersensitivity clopidogrel aspirin . Patients severe hepatic dysfunction aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) > 3 time upper normal reference value . Patients blood coagulation disorder , uncontrolled severe hypertension , active bleeding , history severe bleeding , intracranial hemorrhage ulcer bleed surgery within 48hr , platelet count 50,000/mm3 laboratory test . Patients pregnant , breastfeed . Patients use effective method contraception . ( proper contraception : hormonal contraception , condom , intrauterine device , spermicide ) Patients medically , psychologically investigational product administration 's prohibition . Patients participate clinical trial decide investigator .
